channel.title: halalan on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in halalan on Roy Tang

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Nanaginip? ‘Perlas, with 49,174 votes said that he was expecting “at least a few million” votes’ https://news.abs-cbn.com/nation/05/14/10/surprise-jamby-says-villar-was-cheated #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: For those bemoaning the “unwise” choices of the masses: The poor vote is a thinking vote: http://bit.ly/bw565j #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Appropriate for the results of #halalan RT @rands: Just because you don’t believe doesn’t mean you can’t help.

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Dick Gordon concedes the election to Aquino: http://gordonbayani.com/2010/05/11/dick-gordons-post-election-statement/ #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: RT @kerwintang: manny villar, you may have lost the presidential elections, but your song will remain forever in our minds #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: RT @ANCALERTS: Villar concedes, congratulates Aquino on victory #HALALAN

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Since magaling cummonect sa mahirap si Erap, Noynoy should tap him for something useful like voter education. #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: To those who think Noynoy won’t be a good president: all the more reason to work with him, help him do his job & keep him honest. #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I don’t see why people are surprised with Lapid/Revilla/Estrada winning when it has been predicted by surveys for weeks before #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: if we’re disappointed w the outcome we also share part of the blame, it means we didnt do enuf to educate others #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: to those disappointed w erap’s rank: did u do anything to educate his supporters? #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: RT @trymykungfu good news: automated polls show true will of the people. bad news: automated polls show true will of the people. #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: @PPCRV is there a partial count of party-list available? #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: RT @ericzoo: @deahloids: Let us not forget to thank Dick Gordon for the first ever automated elections in Philippine History. #halalan

item.title: Repost from digitalfilipino https://twitter.com/digitalfilipino/statuses/13730008237/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from digitalfilipino https://twitter.com/digitalfilipino/statuses/13730008237/:

“Democracy is based on the premise that many are wiser than the few.” - Christian Monsod #eleksyon2010 #purplethumb #juanvote #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Seeing Lapid, Revilla, etc. leading in the early results is disheartening >.< Oh Filipino voter, how can we make you grow up? #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Official results at http://bit.ly/bqpsJ2 (why do I have a feeling this site is going to get hammered) #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Just woke up from a nap, congrats to everyone who managed to vote today. Let’s be vigilant and wait for the election results. #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: My parents just came back from our precinct at Quirino Elementary in Anonas, apparently the lines are much shorter now. #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Erap casts his ballot with no mark for the VP slot: http://twitpic.com/1mmetr #halalan Mahaba-habang usapan kay pareng Binay ‘to

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Despite the problems, don’t forget to thank the Comelec staff once you’re done, they’re overworked and underpaid. #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: RT @brainbeam Sacrifice for love of country. No breakfast, extreme heat and exhaustion. Bansang Pilipinas, ganyan ka namin kamahal. #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Mine was the 26th ballot cast in my clustered precinct, it took me 2 hrs. Good luck with the 1000 voters #halalan

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: We’re told there was a problem w the pcos machine and the first batch has just started voting #halalan
